description: This file demonstrates the usage of the OllamaEmbedder to generate embeddings for a text string and initializes an AgentKnowledge object with a PgVector database connection, embedding configuration, and document count.

classes.name: AgentKnowledge
classes.description: Represents a knowledge base agent that interacts with a vector database and embedding models.

classes.name: PgVector
classes.description: A class for interacting with a PostgreSQL vector database.

classes.name: OllamaEmbedder
classes.description: A class for generating embeddings using the Ollama model.

methods.name: get_embedding
methods.description: Generates embeddings for a given text input.
